subject: HS Pro Shifter
description_text:
Hi There,
I've been doing some research and came across your hs pro shifter. Can it
be mounted to a desk? This is the only shifter that I really love. It would
be a shame if it didn't i would get the 6+r shifter you also sell.

Best Regards,

Jamie

conversations.body_text: Hi Jamie Cole, The HS Pro supports the same mounting hole positions as the desktop stand and the 6R. For more details, please refer to the link below. https://www.simsonn.com/products/desktop-fixed-1
